hibernate-mapping.query: select new org.mifos.application.holiday.business.HolidayBO(holidayBO.holidayPK, holidayBO.holidayThruDate, holidayBO.holidayName, repaymentRuleEntity.id, lv.lookUpName) from org.mifos.application.holiday.business.HolidayBO holidayBO, org.mifos.application.holiday.business.RepaymentRuleEntity repaymentRuleEntity ,org.mifos.application.master.business.LookUpValueEntity lv where holidayBO.repaymentRuleEntity.id = repaymentRuleEntity.id and holidayBO.holidayPK.holidayFromDate >= :START_OF_YEAR and holidayBO.holidayPK.holidayFromDate <= :END_OF_YEAR and lv.lookUpId = repaymentRuleEntity.lookUpValue.lookUpId order by holidayBO.holidayPK.holidayFromDate
select distinct(holidayBO.holidayThruDate) from org.mifos.application.holiday.business.HolidayBO holidayBO order by holidayBO.holidayThruDate
